curl_commands.description: Ready-to-use curl commands for testing enhanced BharatGPT API

commands.name: Enhanced Agricultural Query with Pin Code
commands.command: curl -X POST https://bharatgpt-server.<your-subdomain>.workers.dev/ask -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"prompt":"सर्दी में कौन सी फसल बोनी चाहिए?","location":"110001","language":"hi","userType":"farmer"}'

commands.name: Government Scheme with Regional Context
commands.command: curl -X POST https://bharatgpt-server.<your-subdomain>.workers.dev/ask -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"prompt":"How to get solar pump subsidy?","location":"380001","language":"en","userType":"farmer"}'

commands.name: Multilingual Query - Tamil
commands.command: curl -X POST https://bharatgpt-server.<your-subdomain>.workers.dev/ask -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"prompt":"என் நெல் வயலில் பூச்சி தாக்குதல் உள்ளது","location":"600001","language":"ta","userType":"farmer"}'

commands.name: Text-to-Speech - Generate Hindi Audio
commands.command: curl -X POST https://bharatgpt-server.<your-subdomain>.workers.dev/voice/tts -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"text":"नमस्कार, मैं BharatGPT हूं। आपकी खेती में कैसे मदद कर सकता हूं?","language":"hi"}' --output bharatgpt-response.mp3
